section.section: This subsection does not apply in Montgomery County.
The Department shall create or continue a local department in each county.
A local department shall be referred to as the department of social services preceded by the name of the county.

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, a local department shall have a local board and a local director appointed in accordance with this title.
In Baltimore City, the local department shall have a commission of social services.
